properties.name: LedColor
properties.description: Gets or sets the LED foreground color as an integer (RGB).

properties.name: BackgroundColor
properties.description: Gets or sets the background color as an integer (RGB).

properties.name: Use24HourFormat
properties.description: Gets or sets whether to use 24-hour format (true) or 12-hour format (false).

properties.name: ShowSeconds
properties.description: Gets or sets whether to show seconds.

properties.name: IsRunning
properties.description: Gets or sets whether the clock is running.

properties.name: CurrentTime
properties.description: Gets the current time as a formatted string.

methods.name: SetLedColorRGB
methods.description: Sets the LED color using RGB values.

methods.name: SetBackgroundColorRGB
methods.description: Sets the background color using RGB values.

methods.name: About
methods.description: Displays control name and version information in a MessageBox.

events.name: ClockTick
events.description: Fired every time the clock ticks (once per second).

parameters.name: currentTime
parameters.description: The current time as a formatted string

events.name: ClockStarted
events.description: Fired when the clock is started.

events.name: ClockStopped
events.description: Fired when the clock is stopped.
